title: The Congressional Progressive Caucus and Ukraine
dc:creator: Eric Kramer
description:
Yesterday I suggested that the CPC letter calling for Biden to negotiate with Putin was a mistake, and that it was at least partly motivated by a desire to strike a pose for the “utopian blame-America-first segment of the democratic base.” Events have moved quickly since then.  Rep. Jayapal, the head of the CPC, withdrew […]
